attributes.action: Jeremy Corbyn to publish last six years tax returns
attributes.additional_details: Jeremy Corbyn stating PM needs to show clearly he has nothing to hide
attributes.background: Labour have called for transparency in tax affairs and Prime Minister has published tax returns accordingly. In interest of transparency and in accordance with labours own views on MPs being above board on tax and wealth leader of labour should lead by example that he too has nothing to hide

rejection.details:
This is a personal matter for Jeremy Corbyn, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you would like all MPs to be required to publish their tax returns, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126785
